body_html: This is in progress. A an internal PR to add fused to tf.layers.batch_nornmalization is in progress. We made it a top priority. We do not promise dates because things can go wrong or issues come up but I expect it will be in before the end of the quarter. Again, things can go wrong and that is not a promise just guidance.

body: This is in progress.  A an internal PR to add fused to tf.layers.batch_nornmalization is in progress.  We made it a top priority.  We do not promise dates because things can go wrong or issues come up but I expect it will be in before the end of the quarter.  Again, things can go wrong and that is not a promise just guidance.
